sentences.sContent: He loved thefeeling of weightlessness and the excitement and adventure of it all.
sentences.sContent_eng: He loved thefeeling of weightlessness and the excitement and adventure of it all.
sentences.sCn: 不过他喜欢在水下失重的感觉和冒险时带给他内心的那种兴奋。

sentences.sContent: He then remembers time slowing down, a sensation of weightlessness, and a deafening explosion.
sentences.sContent_eng: He then remembers time slowing down, a sensation of weightlessness, and a deafening explosion.
sentences.sCn: 然后他记得时间好像慢了下来，一种失重的感觉，还有震耳欲聋的爆炸声。

sentences.sContent: The astronauts also spun gyroscopes and swung a ball on its tether to show how weightlessness affects objects in motion.
sentences.sContent_eng: The astronauts also spun gyroscopes and swung a ball on its tether to show how weightlessness affects objects in motion.
sentences.sCn: 宇航员们同时也用旋转陀螺仪和摇摆球上的绳子来展示失重影响运动中的物体。
